REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1582 reute r f BC-TEXSCAN-REACHES-REORG 03-30 0058

TEXT.TITLE: TEXSCAN REACHES REORGANIZATION AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: <Texscan Corp>, which filed for bankruptcy in November 1985, said it reached an agreement in principle with its lending bank group on a joint reorganization plan. The company said it expects to file the plan within the next 10 days. Additional detail was not provided. Reuter
